title: IRenderMaterial.GetUDirection2
description: Gets the U direction of the texture-based appearance.
signature:
void GetUDirection2( 
   out System.Double
UDir_X
,
   out System.Double
UDir_Y
,
   out System.Double
UDir_Z
)

parameters.name: UDir_X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the U direction

parameters.name: UDir_Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the U direction

parameters.name: UDir_Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the U direction

remarks:
Call
IRenderMaterial::GetVDirection2
to get the V direction of the appearance.
